title: 9 QA red flags: Identifying bad quality assurance smells
shortDescription: You've likely heard of bad code smells, but let's dive into bad QA smells. These are short heuristics you can use to identify QA problems within your product and team.

title: What is fractional QA?
shortDescription: Curious about what a fractional QA actually is? Not sure how fractional QA can help your startup thrive? Learn more by reading this article!

title: What is bug surface area?
shortDescription: Bug surface area is a problem every software project must tackle. Learn what it is and how effective QA takes control of the problem.

title: "Shift-Left" QA: accelerate your SaaS product development
shortDescription: Discover how "Shift-Left" QA helps SaaS startups improve product development velocity, reduce costs, and gain a competitive edge.

title: QA for early-stage startups
shortDescription: Practical advice for getting started with QA for early-stage startups. Whether you've just found product market fit, or are thinking about improving your product's usability, this guide is a must for any founder.
